title: Phil Collins Reveals He’s Under 24-Hour Care, But Feeling ‘Totally Mobile & Healthy’ in Update
summary: "Everything that could go wrong with me, did go wrong with me," the musician shared.
body: Phil Collins has given fans another health update as he continues to face a number of challenges, explaining that his issues are “an ongoing thing” in an interview with BBC’s Eras . In the conversation dropping Jan. 26, the drummer was candid about the level of treatment he requires on a daily basis to keep him going after a 2007 spinal injury left him with myriad health challenges. “I have a 24-hour live-in nurse to make sure I take my medication, as I should do,” Collins said.
